goalSetting.title: Seta Inhloso Yakho Yekucala
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Luhambo ngalunye ludzinga indzawo yekugcina. Yiyiphi inhloso yakho yekucala yemali?
goalSetting.instruction: Khetsa inye ukuze ucalise. Ungayishintja kamuva.

goalSet.title: Inhloso Isetjwe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Kuhle! Usetile inhloso yakho ku-{{amount}} ye-{{goalTitle}}. Ake sicale kufundza nge-inthanethi ehlanganisiwe!

simulate.title: Fanenkisa
simulate.subtitle: Bona kutsi imali yakho lengayitsatsa ingakhula/incipha kanjani ngesikhatsi
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Bungoti lobukhulu, imbuyiso lenemandla lengaba khona
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Inkhokhelo incane kakhulu kukhokha sikweletu noma sikhatsi siphelile nesamba lesisele:
simulate.add200Desc: Khokha R200 ngekweqile ngenyanga ukuze unciphise imvuzo netinyanga.
simulate.add500Desc: Khokha R500 ngekweqile ngenyanga ukuze ukhokhe ngekushesha.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Yindzele inkhokhelo yakho ukuze ifinyelele ku-R100 lelandzelako.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Yenta inani lelifana nenkhokhelo eyodwa ngekweqile ngenyanga ngemnyaka.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Imali yakho lengayitsatsa ingakhula idlule kabili kuneminikelo yakho ngekukhula lokuhlanganisiwe!
simulate.timeInsight: Ngekuba neminyaka lengu-{{years}}, unika imvuzo lehlanganisiwe sikhatsi lesanele kusebenta.
simulate.contributionInsight: Umsebenti lomuhle! Kunikela nge-R{{amount}} ngenyanga kukubeka endleleni leqinile yekufinyelela emagoli akho.
simulate.debtInsight: Kwandzisa inkhokhelo yakho ngisho nangenani lelincane kunganciphisa kakhulu tinyanga tekukhokha futsi kunciphise inani lemvuzo leliphelele.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Kugcina: imvuzo yemnyaka ivame kukhuphuka njengobe ibhalansi ikhula (ihlanganisiwe).
simulate.debtTableHint: Sikweletu: imvuzo yemnyaka ivame kuncipha njengobe inani lelisisekelo likhokhwa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Lokhu kungukulinganisa lokulula ngenhloso yekufundzisa. Imbuyiso yangempela ingahluka kakhulu ngenca yekushintjashintja kwemakethe, imali lekhokhwayo nalokunye. Kusebenta kwangaphambilini akugcini isiqiniseko semiphumela yesikhatsi lesizayo.
simulate.chartError: Ingxenye yeshadi yehlulekile kubonisa. Lokhu kwenteka kaningi uma imodyuli yendabuko ye-react-native-svg ingaxhunyiwe/ingafakwanga ekwakheni kwedivayisi. Usengasebenzisa i-simulator ngaphandle kweshadi.
simulate.chartFixTips: Thiphu tekulungisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, bese uhlanza & uphinde wakhe. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, bese uphinde wakhe.
simulate.scenarioProjection: Leli linganiso le-{{scenarioName}} libonisa imbuyiso yemnyaka ye-{{returnRate}}% lehlanganisiwe ngenyanga. Ngekufaka kwakho kwamanje ngaphezu kweminyaka le-{{years}} {{yearUnit}}, inani lakho lelilinganiselwe lingaba ngu-{{total}} okungu-{{growth}} kukhula lokuhlanganisiwe.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Lokushoko: Indlela ye-{{scenarioName}} ivame kuhlosela cishe ku-{{returnRate}}% ngemnyaka ngekulinganisa esikhatsini leside, ngemvume yekushintjashintja kwe-{{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Imbuyiso yangempela iyahluka; lokhu akuyona isiqiniseko. Yisebenzise ukuze uzwe kutsi izinga nesikhatsi kushintja kanjani imiphumela.
